description:
A fantastic app to provide scroll lyrics for Spotify and other apps


1. [Add] Smooth rounded corners (Squircle).
2. [Add] Popup animations.
3. [Fix] Pronunciation display in Taskbar Lyrics.
4. [Add] Auto hide, fontsize scale and more options for Taskbar Lyrics.
5. [Fix] Optimize duo line transition animation rendering.
6. [Fix] Taskbar Lyrics for devices that supports tablet mode.
7. [Fix] Optimizes taskbar available area detection when popups are present.
8. [Fix] Notify icon touch press menu.
